Test Steps: Click on a car for details
Click on the heart icon of a car
Expected Result: Car should be successfully added to the wishlist
Actual Result: Car successfully added to the wishlist

Test Steps: Click on the search bar in the header
Expected Result: Search cars by their name or type

Test Steps: Select "SUV" type in the filter bar
Test on desktop, tablet, and mobile
Expected Result: Design should be responsive on all devices
Actual Result: Works on desktop and mobile, not on tablet

Test Steps: Test the website on Chrome, Firefox, and Edge
Expected Result: Website should render correctly on all browsers
Actual Result: Website displayed correctly on all browsers

Test Steps: Enter car details in the form > Click submit
Expected Result: Data should be successfully entered into Sanity and shown in the browser console
Actual Result: Data successfully entered into Sanity and logged in the console

Test Steps: Click "Rent Now" > Redirect to sign-in page > Login > Redirect to billing page
Expected Result: User should be redirected to the sign-in page, logged in, and then redirected to the billing page
Actual Result: User was redirected to sign-in, logged in, and redirected to billing page
